content: It Aint Gonna Just Happen On Its Own  Great read…thanks for sharing! This story is one of many that we will see that move the needle and inspire others to realize the only way to get what you say you want is to be self aware and put in the work. There will be no knight in shining armor that comes and Saves the Day, and your blessing surely won’t drop out of the sky into your lap regardless of how good God is. Botom line is you have to be self aware and put in the work!
